verses.verse: "To the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> The One who <S%G2902>holds<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G792>stars<s%> in His <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand,<s%> the One who <S%G4043>walks<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3319><s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3087>lampstands,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> this: <S%G3592><s%>

'I <S%G3609>know<s%> your <S%G2041>deeds<s%> and your <S%G2873>toil<s%> and <S%G5281>perseverance,<s%> and that you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G941>endure<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G2556>men,<s%> and you <S%G3985>put<s%> to the <S%G3985>test<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3004>call<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and they are not, and you <S%G2147>found<s%> them [to be] <S%G5571>false;<s%>
and you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> and have <S%G941>endured<s%> for My name's <S%G1223>sake,<s%> and have not <S%G2872>grown<s%> <S%G2872>weary.<s%>
'But I <S%G2192>have<s%> [this] <S%G2596>against<s%> you, that you have <S%G863>left<s%> your <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>

<S%G3421>'Remember<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> you have <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> and <S%G3340>repent<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> you did at <S%G4413>first;<s%> <S%G1161>or<s%> <S%G7507>else<s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you, and will <S%G2795>remove<s%> your <S%G3087>lampstand<s%> out of its <S%G5117>place<s%> – <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G3340>repent.<s%>

<S%G235>'Yet<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> you do <S%G2192>have,<s%> that you <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3404>hate.<s%>

'He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches.<s%> To him who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> I will <S%G1325>grant<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> of the <S%G3586>tree<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is in the <S%G3857>Paradise<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>'

"And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4667>Smyrna<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> from The <S%G4413>first<s%> and the <S%G2078>last,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and has come to <S%G2198>life,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> this: <S%G3592><s%>

'I <S%G3609>know<s%> your <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> and your <S%G4432>poverty<s%> (but you are <S%G4145>rich<s%>), and the <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> by <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3004>say<s%> they are <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and are not, but are a <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan.<s%>

'Do not <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you are <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> is <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G906>cast<s%> some of you into <S%G5438>prison,<s%> that you may be <S%G3985>tested,<s%> and you will <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%> Be <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2222>life.<s%>

'He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches.<s%> He who <S%G3528>overcomes<s%> shall not be <S%G91>hurt<s%> by the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>'

"And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G4010>Pergamum<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> from The One who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3691>sharp<s%> two-edged <S%G4501>sword<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> this: <S%G3592><s%>

'I <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> you <S%G2730>dwell,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>'s <S%G2362>throne<s%> is; and you <S%G2902>hold<s%> <S%G2902>fast<s%> My <S%G3686>name,<s%> and did not <S%G720>deny<s%> My <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G493>Antipas,<s%> My <S%G3144>witness,<s%> My <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G4103>one,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> you, <S%G3699>where<s%> Satan <S%G2730>dwells.<s%>

'But I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G3641>things<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> some who <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> kept <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G904>Balak<s%> to <S%G906>put<s%> a <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>block<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1494>things<s%> <S%G1494>sacrificed<s%> to <S%G1494>idols,<s%> and to <S%G4203>commit<s%> [acts of] <S%G4203>immorality.<s%>
<S%G3779>'Thus<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> some who in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G3531>Nicolaitans.<s%>

<S%G3340>'Repent<s%> <S%G3767>therefore;<s%> <S%G1161>or<s%> <S%G7507>else<s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> and I will <S%G4170>make<s%> <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> them with the <S%G4501>sword<s%> of My <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

'He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches.<s%> To him who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> to him I will <S%G1325>give<s%> [some] of the <S%G2928>hidden<s%> <S%G3131>manna,<s%> and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> him a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5586>stone,<s%> and a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> on the <S%G5586>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> but he who <S%G2983>receives<s%> it.'

"And to the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> in <S%G2363>Thyatira<s%> <S%G1125>write:<s%> from The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and His <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5474>burnished<s%> <S%G5474>bronze,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> this: <S%G3592><s%>

'I <S%G3609>know<s%> your <S%G2041>deeds,<s%> and your <S%G26>love<s%> and <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G1248>service<s%> and <S%G5281>perseverance,<s%> and that your <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of <S%G2078>late<s%> are <S%G4183>greater<s%> than at <S%G4413>first.<s%>

'But I <S%G2192>have<s%> [this] <S%G2596>against<s%> you, that you <S%G863>tolerate<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2403>Jezebel,<s%> who <S%G3004>calls<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> a <S%G4398>prophetess,<s%> and she <S%G1321>teaches<s%> and <S%G4105>leads<s%> My bond-servants <S%G4105>astray,<s%> so that they <S%G4203>commit<s%> [acts of] <S%G4203>immorality<s%> and <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G1494>things<s%> <S%G1494>sacrificed<s%> to <S%G1494>idols.<s%>
'And I <S%G1325>gave<s%> her <S%G5550>time<s%> to <S%G3340>repent;<s%> and she does not <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G3340>repent<s%> of her <S%G4202>immorality.<s%>

<S%G2400>'Behold,<s%> I will <S%G906>cast<s%> her upon a <S%G2825>bed<s%> [of sickness], and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery<s%> with her into <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G3340>repent<s%> of her <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

'And I will <S%G615>kill<s%> her <S%G5043>children<s%> with <S%G2288>pestilence;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches<s%> will <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%> He who <S%G2045>searches<s%> the <S%G3510>minds<s%> and <S%G2588>hearts;<s%> and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> of you <S%G2596>according<s%> to your <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

'But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, the <S%G3062>rest<s%> who are in <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> do not <S%G2192>hold<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> have not <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G901>deep<s%> <S%G901>things<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> as they <S%G3004>call<s%> them – I <S%G906>place<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G922>burden<s%> on you.
<S%G4133>'Nevertheless<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2902>hold<s%> <S%G2902>fast<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> I <S%G2240>come.<s%>

'And he who <S%G3528>overcomes,<s%> and he who <S%G5083>keeps<s%> My <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G5056>end,<s%> to him I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G1484>nations;<s%>

and he shall <S%G4165>rule<s%> them with a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron,<s%> as the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of the <S%G2764>potter<s%> are <S%G4937>broken<s%> to <S%G4937>pieces,<s%> as I <S%G2532>also<s%> have <S%G2983>received<s%> [authority] from My <S%G3962>Father;<s%>
and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> him the <S%G4407>morning<s%> <S%G792>star.<s%>
'He who <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G3775>ear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches.<s%>'
